docs.text: AI/ML Workshop In this workshop, you will be working on 3 labs 1. Customer Churn 2. Sentiment extraction from voice 3. DeepRacer
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: In this workshop, you will be working on 3 labs 1. Customer Churn 2. Sentiment extraction from voice 3. DeepRacer

docs.text: Agenda Day 1 Time Topic 9:00 - 12:00 Introduction to Machine Learning on AWS 12:00 - 13:00 Lunch 13:00 - 14:00 Personalize - recommendation engine 14:00 - 17:00 Lab 1 - SageMaker and Customer churn analysis Day 2 9:00 - 12:00: Introduction to AI and Machine Learning Services on AWS 12:00 - 13:00: Lunch 13:00 - 15:00: Lab 2 - Web application with Transcribe and Comprehend 15:00 - 17:00: Lab 3 - DeepRacer (optional)
